summary: This mod offers various re-colour themes for the amazing mod "Ayleid Sanctuary".
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5][color=cyan]Ayleid Sanctuary - Colour Themes[/color][/size][/b]


[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/63179-1-1425131102.png[/img]


[b][size=4]Requirements[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62580][b][color=cyan]Ayleid Sanctuary[/color][/b][/url]


[b][size=4]Description[/size][/b]
Ayleid Sanctuary - Colour Themes offers various re-colour themes for the amazing "Ayleid Sanctuary" mod.  Some minor changes to the Sanctuary itself have also been made in this add-on.  You may choose from either blue, pink, or yellow - the screenshots in the "Images" section will give you a better idea regarding these options.

It is important to note that if you have an existing save game and are using the mannequins, weapon racks and / or the display cases within the Sanctuary, you may want to remove any contents from these before installing this mod.

I will do my best to provide regular and consistent support for this mod.  Please leave your questions / comments in the "Posts" section, or alternatively, you may feel free to send me a message.  I encourage you to upload images as well!

I would like to thank SkyrimLazz, JGreybear, RIP88, DarkFox127, InsanitySorrow, and Tamira - they deserve more credit than I.  Their works and textures are wonderful, and if you are seeking great mods, I wholeheartedly recommend that you take a look at their creations.  Without their original content, it would not have been possible for me to complete these re-textures.

On a final note, if you like this work, I ask that you [color=cyan][b][i]please do not forget to endorse not only this mod, but the original Ayleid Sanctuary mod as well[/i][/b][/color] if you have not already done so.  I appreciate you taking the time to do so, as I have worked diligently to complete this content.  When mod authors see endorsements increasing, it gives us incentive to continue creating great things for the land of Skyrim, and it shows us that you enjoy our work, and appreciate our time.

As always, thank you for downloading this mod - enjoy!
